meanings.definition: A type of tree that belongs to the genus Quercus.
meanings.sent1: The oaks in the park provide cool shade on hot days.
meanings.sent2: I love the sound of wind rustling through the oaks.
meanings.sent3: The squirrels in the oaks seem to have their own little community up there.
meanings.sent4: The strength of the oaks symbolizes resilience in the face of adversity.
meanings.sent5: The ancient oaks stood tall, their branches reaching for the sky.

meanings.definition: The wood of an oak tree.
meanings.sent1: The table was crafted from sturdy oaks.
meanings.sent2: The aroma of freshly cut oaks filled the workshop.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat sharpened its claws on the oaks, much to the dismay of the owner.
meanings.sent4: The oaks in the fireplace crackled and popped, filling the room with warmth.
meanings.sent5: The intricate carvings on the oaks revealed the artisan's skill and dedication.

meanings.definition: A shade of brown resembling the color of oak wood.
meanings.sent1: Her eyes sparkled with a warm oaks hue.
meanings.sent2: The cozy living room was painted in a soothing oaks tone.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel tried to hide its acorn stash in the oaks-colored carpet.
meanings.sent4: The old photograph had faded to a nostalgic oaks shade.
meanings.sent5: The artist mixed paints to create the perfect oaks color for the landscape.
